name: Paris
bestTimeOfDay: Evening for landmarks, early morning for museums
description: Paris is a global center for art, culture, food, and history. Known for its romantic charm, iconic architecture, and world-class museums, Paris offers a blend of historic beauty and modern life along the Seine.

activities.title: Visit the Eiffel Tower
activities.description: Explore one of the world’s most iconic landmarks, including the observation decks.

activities.title: Explore the Louvre Museum
activities.description: See world-famous works like the Mona Lisa and Winged Victory.

activities.title: Walk through Montmartre & Sacré-Cœur
activities.description: Stroll the artistic streets and enjoy sweeping views of Paris.

altText: Panoramic view of Paris with the Eiffel Tower rising above the city’s rooftops under a cloudy sky.

name: Los Angeles
bestTimeOfDay: Late afternoon for beaches, nighttime for observatory
description: Los Angeles is a sprawling coastal city known for entertainment, beaches, diverse food, and creative culture.

activities.title: Walk along Santa Monica Pier
activities.description: Enjoy the ocean views, amusement rides, and lively boardwalk.

activities.title: Visit the Griffith Observatory
activities.description: Learn about astronomy and enjoy panoramic views of LA.

activities.title: Explore Hollywood Boulevard
activities.description: See the Walk of Fame, street performers, and historic theaters.

altText: Aerial sunset view of downtown Los Angeles with skyscrapers surrounded by sprawling city lights.

name: New York City
distanceFromCityCenter: Varies — most attractions 0–3 miles from midtown
bestTimeOfDay: Morning for museums, evening for Times Square
description: New York City is a fast-paced cultural capital known for skyscrapers, world-class shows, and unbeatable food.

activities.title: See Times Square
activities.description: Experience the lights, billboards, and energetic crowds.

activities.title: Walk through Central Park
activities.description: A scenic stroll through NYC’s most famous green space.

activities.title: Visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art
activities.description: Explore one of the world’s greatest art collections.

altText: Street-level view of tall New York City buildings with cars and pedestrians lining the urban street.

name: Athens
bestTimeOfDay: Early morning for ancient sites to avoid heat
description: Athens blends ancient history with lively modern culture.

activities.title: Tour the Acropolis
activities.description: Visit the Parthenon and surrounding temples.

activities.title: Explore Plaka
activities.description: Wander narrow streets filled with shops and tavernas.

activities.title: Visit the Acropolis Museum
activities.description: See artifacts that complement the ancient site.

altText: Hillside view of Athens with white buildings and ancient ruins overlooking the modern city.

name: Barcelona
bestTimeOfDay: Evening for tapas and beaches, morning for Gaudí sites
description: Barcelona is famous for its architecture, beaches, and vibrant food scene.

activities.title: Visit Sagrada Família
activities.description: See Gaudí’s breathtaking basilica.

activities.title: Walk La Rambla
activities.description: Enjoy performers, shops, and markets.

activities.title: Relax at Barceloneta Beach
activities.description: A lively beachfront great for sunbathing.

altText: Back view of a traveler raising their arms while overlooking the city of Barcelona at sunrise.

name: Beijing
description: Beijing is a cultural and political capital filled with imperial landmarks.

activities.title: Explore the Forbidden City
activities.description: A massive palace complex.

activities.title: Visit Tiananmen Square
activities.description: One of the world's largest public squares.

activities.title: Walk the Great Wall (Mutianyu)
activities.description: A scenic and less crowded section.

altText: Nighttime skyline of Beijing with illuminated skyscrapers, including the iconic CCTV Headquarters building.

name: Cape Town
distanceFromCityCenter: 0–4 miles around waterfront and Table Mountain
bestTimeOfDay: Morning for hiking, sunset for beaches
description: Cape Town is known for dramatic landscapes, history, and a thriving arts scene.

activities.title: Ride the Table Mountain Cableway
activities.description: Take in panoramic views.

activities.title: Visit the V&A Waterfront
activities.description: Restaurants, shops, and harbor views.

activities.title: Explore Camps Bay Beach
activities.description: Relax on a scenic beach.

altText: Waterfront view of Cape Town at dusk with Table Mountain in the background and colorful reflections on the harbor.

name: Lima
distanceFromCityCenter: 0–3 miles around Miraflores and historic center
bestTimeOfDay: Afternoon for ocean views, morning for historic sites
description: Lima is a coastal capital blending colonial architecture, seaside cliffs, and renowned cuisine.

activities.title: Walk the Miraflores Malecón
activities.description: Scenic cliffside views.

activities.title: Tour the Historic Center
activities.description: Visit Plaza Mayor and colonial buildings.

activities.title: Explore Larco Museum
activities.description: Pre-Columbian art and artifacts.

altText: Historic plaza in Lima featuring colonial architecture, palm trees, and a central fountain under a bright sky.

name: New Delhi
bestTimeOfDay: Early morning for forts and temples
description: New Delhi features Mughal architecture, bustling markets, and rich cultural traditions.

activities.title: Visit the Red Fort
activities.description: Explore a major Mughal fortress.

activities.title: Explore Connaught Place
activities.description: Shopping and dining hub.

activities.title: See Qutub Minar
activities.description: A UNESCO site with the tallest brick minaret.

altText: Busy market street in New Delhi with crowded buildings, vibrant signage, and people navigating narrow lanes.

name: Sydney
bestTimeOfDay: Morning for beaches, evening around the harbor
description: Sydney is a picturesque harbor city known for beaches, the Opera House, and an outdoor lifestyle.

activities.title: Visit the Sydney Opera House
activities.description: Tour the iconic performing arts venue.

activities.title: Walk the Bondi to Coogee Trail
activities.description: A stunning coastal walk.

activities.title: Explore Darling Harbour
activities.description: Dining, museums, and waterfront views.

altText: Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge at sunset overlooking the harbor waters.

name: Tokyo
bestTimeOfDay: Evening for neon districts, morning for temples
description: Tokyo blends futuristic innovation with deep cultural traditions.

activities.title: Visit Senso-ji Temple
activities.description: Tokyo’s oldest temple.

activities.title: Explore Shibuya Crossing
activities.description: One of the busiest pedestrian intersections in the world.

activities.title: Wander Shinjuku at Night
activities.description: Neon lights and nightlife.

altText: Tokyo cityscape at sunset with a traditional pagoda in the foreground and Mount Fuji in the distance.
